page.title: 14ECONOMICS * ENERGY
page.content:
{ECONOMICS In Firle village there is only one means of saving and that is the little Post Office which most people use instead of going to the town to the bank.You can draw pensions and buy stamps here as well as getting money.There are no banks or building societies which is difficult for old people.
{ENERGY} There is no gas in Firle because it is not joined to the gas mains. Some people have electric cookers and some use solid fuel cookers called Rayburns. Sometimes peoples homes are heated by their Rayburns. Some houses have electric central heating. Some houses have Calor gas heaters.
